game.title: The Missing Merchant
game.description: The merchant, Geralt, has gone missing during a trip to a nearby village. His wife, Triss, has hired you to find him and bring him back home.

task.objective: Talk to the villagers in the village where Geralt was last seen.
task.description: Talk to the villagers in the village of Byways to see if they have any information about his whereabouts.

task.objective: Search the forest outside the village for any clues.
task.description: Search the forest of Whispering Trees for any clues that might lead you to Geralt.

task.objective: Follow the clues to find Geralt.
task.description: Follow the clues you have found to locate Geralt in a cave in the mountains.

task.objective: Defeat the bandits who are holding Geralt captive.
task.description: Defeat the bandits at their camp in the mountains and rescue Geralt.
task.location: The bandit camp in the mountains

task.description: Return Geralt to his wife, Triss, in the village of Byways.
